popups.upload.Enter.torrent.name: File Name
popups.upload.ufrInfo: Set a price for your file(s) in UFR. Other users must pay this price in order to download and decrypt your files.
popups.torrentGenerate: Completing generation of your Upfiring file
popups.reseed.title: Reseed with a new Price
popups.torrentGenerateSubtitle: Almost done, please wait a moment…
upload.error.torrentNameFileName: Upfiring file with this name already exists
upload.error.torrentFiles: Please select files to create an Upfiring file
wallet.eth.info: ETH is used as gas to cover transaction fees for sending or withdrawing UFR.
wallet.ufr.info: UFR is used to decrypt files. You can use the "Replenish" button to the right to move UFR from your wallet to the Upfiring smart contract. Once in the smart contract, your UFR can be used to decrypt Upfiring files on the network.
wallet.notYet: You do not have a wallet yet
wallet.CreateOrUpload: You do not have a wallet yet. Please upload or create a new one.
wallet.warningMessage: Upfiring does not store your passwords or keys.
wallet.warningMessageMore: Upfiring cannot access accounts, recover keys, reset passwords, or reverse transactions.
wallet.dangerMessage: Don’t forget to save your password, we will not be able to restore it for you
wallet.replenishSubtitle: Enter the amount of UFR to add from your wallet to your account in the Upfiring smart contract.
remove.torrent: Are you sure you want to delete the Upfiring file?
remove.selectedtorrent: Are you sure you want to delete the selected Upfiring file(s)?
FirstEntrance.Upload.hint.subtitle: Information
FirstEntrance.Upload.hint.first: Upload your files: You can drag files into the application, or
FirstEntrance.Upload.hint.second: Add description and set the price of your Upfiring file.
FirstEntrance.Upload.hint.third: The file will converted to an Upfiring file (.ufr file) and you will get a link to share with other users to download your file.
FirstEntrance.Upload.table.noFilesYet: You have no uploaded files yet. Once you upload files, they will appear here.
FirstEntrance.Download.table.noFilesYet: There are no downloading files. Once you start downloading files, they will appear here.
FirstEntrance.Completed.table.noFilesYet: There are no completed files. Once you finished downloading files, they will appear here.
FirstEntrance.Download.hint: To download files, paste a link in the field below.
FirstEntrance.Finished.table.noFilesYet: You have no completed files yet.
FirstEntrance.Finished.hint.first: To open your completed files press “Decrypt”.
FirstEntrance.Finished.hint.second: Completed files can be reseeded with the same UFR price or you may set a new UFR price. If you set a new price, you will receive a link to share with others for them to download your file at the new price.
FirstEntrance.Finished.hint.third: You can press Delete (X) to stop seeding a file.
FirstEntrance.PopUp.Title: Decentralized and Incentivized File-Sharing.
FirstEntrance.PopUp.Subtitle: Welcome to the Upfiring Application
FirstEntrance.PopUp.important: First, you need to create a wallet to store your UFR tokens. You can create a new wallet or add an existing wallet. When adding an existing wallet, any ERC20-compatible Ethereum wallet will work.
FirstEntrance.PopUp.description: Upload files, set a price, and get rewarded with UFR tokens when your files are downloaded. Share your Upfiring files with others to allow them to download your file!
Withdraw.Popup.Title: Withdraw
Withdraw.Popup.SubTitle: Withdraw limits
Withdraw.Popup.help: Please note that you need to pay gas (a small transaction fee) to broadcast this transaction to the Ethereum network.

stub.upload.title: Create an Upfiring file
stub.upload.subtitle: Upload files and convert them into encrypted Upfiring files with built-in UFR prices. You can then share these files with others and earn UFR each time they are downloaded.
stub.upload.subtitleMore: Drag your files here or use the “Upload” button below.
stub.download.title: Downloads
stub.download.subtitle: Download Upfiring files from others here.
stub.download.subtitleMore: Drag .ufr files here or use the “Browse” button below.
stub.completed.title: Completed downloads
stub.completed.subtitle: Upfiring files that have finished downloading will appear here.
stub.completed.subtitleMore: You need to decrypt Upfiring files to gain access to the content inside of them.

stub.wallet.subtitle: To properly use the Upfiring application, you must add your Ethereum wallet
stub.wallet.subtitleMore: You can use an existing wallet or create a new one
